title: Akira (1988) [No Grain][1080p][5.1][Tri-Audio][Hi10p]
description:
In this version I removed most of the film grain. This is the better version if you are not a purist. You should own this by the way, any anime fan should. I am about to encode Fairy Tail Part 7 for the people that were about to ask.
